item.title: Content Matters
item.description:
When it comes to SEO, keywords aren’t everything. The content of the website is crucial for the search engine to determine whether it will rank high or not.

Content is King

The more useful, well informed andÂ trustworthyÂ your web page content is,Â the higher it will rankÂ in search engines. Great content is what helps your rankingsÂ most. Keywords will help users findÂ you, but the content of your web pages is what willÂ keep them on your site once they get there.Â

item.title: Building an E-Commerce Website - Day 1
item.description:
My Coding Project Series

This post is the first of many where I will be writing about building an e-commerce website from start to finish. I will write about how to start a project in VS Code (you can use whatever IDE you desire, I prefer VS Code), connect it to GitHub, install all the packages required, and more!

I’m so excited for this!

So join me in this wonderful journey of coding and creating a website of your own! ðŸ’œ
